amendatorysection.catchline: Handicapped or disabled parking permit, defined.
amendatorysection.para: Handicapped or disabled parking permit means:
(1) A permit issued under section 18-1738 or 18-1738.01 prior to the implementation date designated by the director under section 60-3,113.01; or
(2) A permit issued under section 60-3,113.02 or 60-3,113.03 on or after the implementation date designated by the director under section 60-3,113.01.
